name: ZhuZhu Princesses: Carriages & Castles
description:
Dress up, feed and explore with Snowcup, Patches, NumNums, Pipsqueak, Jilly, Nugget, Peachy, Pinky and Dashington!

Throughout your journey, you will encounter jumps, slides, tunnels and more!

40+ levels of exploration!

Help Princess Snowcup find her way to Prince Dashington’s Castle through jumps, slides, tunnels and more!
